channel.title: J.P. Wing on Nicola Iarocci
channel.description: Recent content in J.P. Wing on Nicola Iarocci
channel.copyright: Produced / Written / Maintained by Nicola Iarocci since 2010

item.title: Quoting J.P. Wing
item.description: When I’m out hiking on my weekend hike I often spend much of the experience in contemplation. My thoughts are usually tickling at Warp 10, going everywhere possible at once, but then I ramp it back a bit and I just think about an assortment of topics at any given moment. Out in nature is really a good place for me to get things back into perspective, and I usually feel the better for it when I get back home.
item.content:encoded:
When I’m out hiking on my weekend hike I often spend much of the experience in contemplation. My thoughts are usually tickling at Warp 10, going everywhere possible at once, but then I ramp it back a bit and I just think about an assortment of topics at any given moment. Out in nature is really a good place for me to get things back into perspective, and I usually feel the better for it when I get back home.

– J.P. Wing
